control.visible: [Control.IsVisible(50) + !Window.IsActive(musicplaylisteditor)] | Control.IsVisible(56) | Control.IsVisible(560) | Control.IsVisible(561) | Control.IsVisible(57) | [Window.IsActive(contextmenu) + ![Window.IsActive(home) | Window.IsActive(favourites) | Window.IsActive(locksettings) | Window.IsActive(profiles) | Window.IsActive(musicplaylisteditor) | Window.IsActive(filemanager)]] | Window.IsActive(PlayerControls) | Window.IsActive(shutdownmenu) | Window.IsActive(movieinformation) | Window.IsActive(musicinformation) | Window.IsActive(songinformation) | Window.IsActive(addoninformation)

ondown.condition: [Library.HasContent(movies) + Container(20).HasFocus(2) + Skin.HasSetting(HideMoviesSubMenu)] | [Library.HasContent(tvshows) + Container(20).HasFocus(1) + Skin.HasSetting(HideTVShowsSubMenu)] | [Library.HasContent(music) + Container(20).HasFocus(3) + Skin.HasSetting(HideMusicSubMenu)]

![Window.IsActive(ShutdownMenu) | Window.IsActive(BusyDialog) | Window.IsActive(ProgressDialog) | Window.IsActive(PlayerControls) | Container(20).OnNext | Container(20).OnPrevious] + Container(20).HasFocus(1)

![Window.IsActive(ShutdownMenu) | Window.IsActive(BusyDialog) | Window.IsActive(ProgressDialog) | Window.IsActive(PlayerControls) | Container(20).OnNext | Container(20).OnPrevious] + Container(20).HasFocus(3)

![Window.IsActive(ShutdownMenu) | Window.IsActive(BusyDialog) | Window.IsActive(ProgressDialog) | Window.IsActive(PlayerControls) | Container(20).OnNext | Container(20).OnPrevious] + Container(20).HasFocus(9)

animation.condition: ![Container(20).OnScrollNext | Container(20).OnScrollPrevious | Container(20).Scrolling] + !ControlGroup(21).HasFocus + !Window.IsActive(Favourites) + !Window.IsActive(ShutdownMenu) + !Window.IsActive(BusyDialog) + !Window.IsActive(PlayerControls) + !Control.HasFocus(81) + !Control.HasFocus(82) + !Control.HasFocus(83) + !Control.HasFocus(23) + ![Container(20).OnScrollNext | Container(20).OnScrollPrevious | Container(20).Scrolling] + [[[Library.HasContent(movies) + Container(20).HasFocus(2)] + !Skin.HasSetting(HideMoviesSubMenu)] | [[Library.HasContent(tvshows) + Container(20).HasFocus(1)] + !Skin.HasSetting(HideTVShowsSubMenu)] | [[Library.HasContent(music) + Container(20).HasFocus(3)] + !Skin.HasSetting(HideMusicSubMenu)] | [Container(20).HasFocus(9) + !Skin.HasSetting(HideSettingsSubMenu)] | [Container(20).HasFocus(11) + !Skin.HasSetting(HideLiveTVSubMenu)]]
